settings.subheading: With cloud-like textures and lightweight warmth, we create an intimate shelter for the body, exploring the connection between function and feeling.

settings.text: Our Sherpa fleece is engineered for an exceptionally soft hand-feel, perfect for creating the premium hoodies, pullovers, and linings your customers will love.
settings.title: Unparalleled Softness & Comfort

settings.description: A sentence or two introducing your brand, what you sell, and what makes your brand compelling to customers.

We wanted to create a statement bomber jacket and Fominte's Printed Sherpa was the perfect canvas. The print quality is fantastic, with vibrant colors that don't fade. Their ability to bring our complex patterns to life on such a textural fabric opened up new creative possibilities for us.
settings.title: Isabella Garcia（Creative Director）

settings.description: Fominte’s Bonded Sherpa has streamlined our production for our trucker jackets. Having the fleece already bonded to the outer fabric saves us a significant manufacturing step. The final material has great structure and the built-in warmth is a key selling point.
settings.title: David Lee（Head of Production）

settings.description: Our brand is built on comfort, and Fominte's Classic Sherpa is exceptionally soft. What's crucial for us is that it maintains that luxurious feel wash after wash, thanks to its high anti-pilling rating. It’s perfect for the premium hoodies and pullovers our customers love.
settings.title: Chloe Kim（Designer）

settings.description: The technical specs on Fominte's Sherpa are what sold us. The Level 4 anti-pilling rating holds up after extensive testing, and the anti-static finish is a feature our customers appreciate. It’s a truly high-performance fleece that we trust for our vests and jacket linings
settings.title: Michael Larson（Materials Manager）

settings.html:
Sherpa Fleece

Core Capabilities

Applications

Customization

Care Instructions

FAQ

Our Commitment

Our Core Capabilities

A stable and reliable supply chain is the cornerstone of your business. We have established a vertically integrated production base, integrating R&D, production, and innovation to ensure dependable results.

Strong Production Capabilities>

Scale & Capacity: Our advanced fleece production lines grant us a powerful annual capacity, ensuring we can confidently deliver orders of any scale—from specialized custom batches to large-scale production runs for global brands.

Vertical Integration: Our control over the entire industrial chain—from fiber selection, knitting, and finishing to the final product—means we can guarantee stable quality and predictable delivery times from the source.

Global Delivery & Trust>

Trusted by clients in over 120 countries, our extensive experience in international trade guarantees you a smooth and dependable partnership. Our Sherpa fleece is a passport to global fashion and performance markets, and we have a proven track record of meeting diverse international standards.

Technology & Innovation>

Our facilities are equipped with state-of-the-art knitting machines, napping equipment, and finishing lines. This allows us to produce Sherpa fleece with superior softness, a consistent Level 4 anti-pilling finish, and integrated anti-static properties. Our on-site R&D team also enables rapid prototyping and the development of innovative new materials.

Sustainable & Ethical Practices>

Our commitment is a pledge to product excellence, environmental stewardship, and ethical practices. We are certified by ISO 9001, BSCI, GRS, and SGS. We commit to the ethical treatment of workers (BSCI) and using 100% verified recycled materials for our Recycled Sherpa line (GRS).

Sherpa Fleece Applications

Our Sherpa fleece is engineered to excel, serving as either a high-performance lining or a visually striking primary fabric.

Coats>

The Full-Sherpa Statement: Create bold, on-trend outerwear by using our Classic or Printed Sherpa as the main body fabric for cozy, fashion-forward statement coats.

The High-Performance Lining: Elevate any coat with the superior warmth of a Sherpa fleece lining, perfect for wool, canvas, or technical outerwear.

Bonded Fabric Solutions: Streamline production with our Bonded Sherpa, which serves as both the exterior and the integrated lining.

Jackets>

Our fleece provides the ideal combination of lightweight warmth, durability, and style for multi-season jackets.

The Timeless Aviator & Trucker: Craft iconic styles with our Bonded Sherpa, perfect for timeless aviator, trucker, and workwear-inspired jackets.

The Fashion-Forward Piece: Use our Printed Sherpa to create eye-catching bomber jackets and unique zip-ups.

Sustainable & Ready: Leverage our 100% Recycled Sherpa to build your next eco-conscious jacket collection.

Vests>

A vest or gilet is the ultimate layering piece. Our fleece provides an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio for transitional weather and active lifestyles.

The Outdoor Gilet: Use our Classic or Bonded Sherpa to create functional, outdoor-inspired vests that provide core insulation with a full range of motion.

The Cozy Interior: Enhance any vest by using our Classic Sherpa as a soft, comfortable lining for a layer of unexpected luxury.

Sweatshirts>

Elevate the classic sweatshirt to a premium garment. Our fleece is key to creating incredibly soft pieces for the loungewear and casualwear markets.

The Ultimate Cozy Pullover: Craft the perfect half-zip, hoodie, or pullover using our Classic Sherpa, with a high anti-pilling rating to ensure it looks great wash after wash.

Style & Structure: Use our Printed Sherpa for unique graphic sweatshirts or choose Bonded Sherpa for more structured, polished silhouettes.

Customization - Sherpa Fleece

Our integrated R&D and production capabilities allow for deep customization. We collaborate with you to engineer the perfect material for your specific requirements.

Our Customization Capabilities>

Custom Color & Print: We offer precise Pantone color matching and advanced printing for complex, high-fidelity patterns.

Weight & Performance Tuning: Control the exact warmth and feel by specifying the weight (GSM), and fine-tune characteristics like the anti-static finish.

Custom Bonding Solutions: We can bond our fleece to a wide range of fabrics—including suede, cotton, and various knits—to develop innovative materials.

Finished Garment (OEM) Solutions: Provide us with your tech packs, and we can manufacture fully-customized coats, jackets, and sweatshirts, complete with your private labels.

Customization Process>

Our structured process includes: Consultation & Quote, where we discuss your concept and provide a quote/MOQ; Sampling, with a typical lead time of one week; Sample Approval, where we ship the sample for your feedback; and Bulk Production upon approval.

Design Confidentiality>

Absolutely. We treat all custom projects with strict confidentiality. Your design is your intellectual property, and we will never disclose or sell your exclusive patterns to any third party.

Maintaining Peak Softness & Performance

To preserve its signature softness, high-performance anti-pilling surface, and insulating properties, proper care is essential. Following these instructions will ensure the longevity of the garment.

Washing Instructions>

Machine Washing (Recommended): Turn the garment inside out, use a gentle cycle with cold water, and a small amount of mild liquid detergent. Avoid fabric softeners. Wash with other soft garments.

Hand Washing: Submerge in cold water with mild detergent, gently squeeze the suds through the fabric, and rinse thoroughly with clean, cold water. Avoid aggressive rubbing.

Drying Instructions>

Air Drying (Strongly Recommended): Lay the garment flat on a clean towel or hang it on a clothesline away from direct sunlight to preserve its texture.

Tumble Drying (Use with Caution): Use the lowest possible heat setting, such as "Tumble Dry Low" or an "Air Fluff" (no heat) cycle. Do not use dryer sheets and remove the garment promptly.

What to Avoid>

To prevent permanent damage, please strictly avoid the following: Do Not Use High Heat, Do Not Bleach, Do Not Iron, Do Not Use Fabric Softener, and Do Not Dry Clean.

Storage>

Ensure the garment is completely clean and dry before storing. Store in a well-ventilated, dry place away from direct sunlight. Folding neatly is acceptable; if hanging, use a supportive hanger.

Frequently Asked Questions

What makes your Sherpa fleece a high-quality choice?>

Our fleece stands out due to its superior technical specifications: exceptional softness, a certified Level 4 anti-pilling rating for long-lasting appearance, and anti-static treatment for enhanced comfort.

What exactly is "Bonded Sherpa"?>

Bonded Sherpa is an innovative textile we create by permanently fusing our fleece to another fabric (like suede or cotton). This creates a single, versatile material with a finished interior and exterior, providing enhanced structure and warmth while streamlining production.

Is your Recycled Sherpa comparable in quality?>

Absolutely. Our Recycled Sherpa is made from 100% GRS-certified recycled polyester and is engineered to meet the exact same high-performance standards as our conventional fleece, including softness, durability, and color vibrancy.

What is your MOQ?>

Our MOQ is flexible. It is generally lower for in-stock fabrics and higher for custom-developed fabrics (colors, prints, bonding) and finished OEM garments. Please contact our sales team for a specific quote.

Do you ship to my country?>

Yes. 100% of our products are exported, and we have experience shipping to over 120 countries worldwide. Our logistics team can arrange reliable shipping to your location.

Still Have Questions?>

If you couldn't find the answer you were looking for, or wish to discuss your project in greater detail, please do not hesitate to reach out. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you. Contact us directly at: Stephen@fominte.com

Our Commitment

Our promise is woven into every fiber we produce. We are committed to delivering unparalleled quality, innovative design, and a partnership you can trust through measurable standards.

Commitment to Speed & Efficiency>

We understand that speed-to-market is critical for your success. Our streamlined process ensures your vision becomes a reality, fast.

Rapid Sampling: We pledge to deliver satisfactory custom samples for your approval within 7 working days.

Reliable Delivery: Once approved, we guarantee that standard bulk orders will be ready for shipment within 30 days. This predictability allows you to plan your collections with confidence.

Commitment to Responsive Service>

Clear and timely communication is the foundation of a great partnership. Our dedicated team is always accessible, ensuring your questions are answered and your project never loses momentum.

Online Inquiries: For messages received via our online chat during business hours, we commit to a response time of under 2 hours.

Email Correspondence: All email inquiries will receive a comprehensive reply within 24 hours.

Commitment to Quality & Partnership>

Beyond speed and service, our ultimate commitment is to the integrity of our product and the strength of our relationship. We stand behind every yard of fabric, ensuring it meets global standards and your highest expectations. We are more than a supplier; we are a dedicated partner in your success, committed to design confidentiality and ethical practices.

CORE ADVANTAGES

Factory & Design

Supply Chain

Blending cozy warmth with trending Aztec and geometric patterns, Fominte delivers ready-to-wear jackets that transition seamlessly from urban streets to outdoor escapes. Experience the ultimate soft-touch texture designed for the modern lifestyle.
